parameters.name: Open
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable or disable weighted round-robin. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables weighted round-robin. This is the default value.
*   **false**: disables weighted round-robin.

parameters.name: SubDomain
parameters.description: The subdomain for which you want to configure weighted round-robin. Do not set the value to a string such as aliyun.com. Instead, set the value to @.aliyun.com.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the DNS record. Valid values: A and AAAA. Default value: A.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client that you use to configure weighted round-robin.
